body: r_c wails when {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/see/sees} the body of {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} parent, m_c, lying still and cold.

r_c feels numb with grief when {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/hear/hears} what's happened to m_c. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} can hardly imagine a world without {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} parent's love and support.
m_c's body lays in the clearing and r_c nuzzles up beside {PRONOUN/m_c/object}, wishing only to feel the warmth of {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} parent's presence.
As the Clan sits vigil for m_c, r_c wants to howl. How {VERB/r_c/are/is} {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} supposed to go through life without m_c guiding {PRONOUN/r_c/object}?
r_c gently licks m_c's fur clean, as m_c once did for {PRONOUN/r_c/object} in the nursery, and blinks back tears.
r_c, voice hoarse with grief, tells stories of m_c's care and wisdom as the Clan sits vigil for {PRONOUN/m_c/object}, making sure c_n honors {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} parent.
